description: Our favorite high-end gaming headset for PS5, Xbox, and PC is on sale for a massive discount at Amazon ahead of Prime Day 2024. The wireless version of the SteelSeries Nova Pro is discounted by $75 for both PlayStation and Xbox. The black model is eligible for the PC and PlayStation deal, while the white edition is available for Xbox. The Xbox version works wirelessly on all consoles and PC (plus Bluetooth-enabled devices), while the PlayStation version works wirelessly with everything except Xbox. You can also save $75 on the wired version of the Nova Pro.
title: Prime Day Deal - The Best Premium Gaming Headset Is On Sale For Its Lowest Price Yet At Amazon

description: Earlier this year, the popular legal drama Suits finally released on Blu-ray following a huge resurgence in popularity after being added to Netflix. The 35-disc collection contains all 134 episodes as well as a bunch of special features. In the lead-up to Prime Day 2024, Amazon has dropped the price of Suits: The Complete Series to $75. Considering it launched in March for $110--Walmart sold out at that price--this is a deal fans should pay attentio
title: Suits Complete Series On Blu-Ray Is On Sale For Over 30% Off At Amazon

description:
Sometimes, you need a 10-inch Optimus Prime statue to really bring a room together. Amazon has you covered with a bunch of deals as part of its early Prime Day sale, offering a few impressive statues from Numskull and other manufacturers. Whether it's a robot in disguise, a twisted G-Virus creature, or a piece of Destiny 2 armor that you're trying to add to your collection, it's worth noting that these are all coupon deals for Prime Day, which means they're likely to go fast.

Don't forget to check out the rest of GameSpot's Prime Day coverage for a rundown of all the best deals.

Optimus Prime Limited Edition replica statue deal
title: Transformers, Resident Evil, and Destiny 2 Statues Get Huge Discounts For Prime Day

description:
The PlayStation HD Camera, one of the few official first-party accessories for PS5, is on sale for only $41.30 (was $60) at Amazon ahead of Prime Day 2024. The PlayStation Camera rarely receives price cuts, so we expect this deal to go fast. As an Amazon Lightning Deal, limited quantities are available.

Get deal at Amazon

The PlayStation HD Camera offer 1080p video capture with dual wide lenses. It can be used to record yourself while streaming live or capturing gameplay for your next video upload. It interacts with the PS5's DualSense controller via the Create button, allowing you to instantly start/stop your video capture.

The PlayStation 5 has a set of software tools to help you edit your videos, including a
title: Official PlayStation Camera Receives Rare Discount At Amazon - Limited Quantities Available

description: Best Buy has a fantastic deal on the Asus ROG 65W Charger Dock ahead of Prime Day 2024. This deal was very popular when it was first offered back in May, so we'd recommend grabbing it while you can. You can get the official Asus ROG 65W Charger Dock for only $30 (was $65). It doubles as both an AC power brick and a docking station thanks to the HDMI adapter and USB 2.0 port. This deal is available alongside $100 discounts on the Asus ROG Ally Windows gaming handheld.
title: Get This Handy Steam Deck And ROG Ally Charger Dock For Over 50% Off

description: We're seeing some rare discounts on sought-after games ahead of Prime Day, and you can add Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince to that list. Nintendo Switch owners will want to act fast on this GameStop deal, as physical stock of the game sells out fast whenever there is a sale, and this time, the game has reached an all-time low price of $35.
title: Dragon Quest Monsters: The Dark Prince Gets Rare Discount, Down To Lowest Price Yet

description: They say good things come to those who wait, and if you've been keeping an eye out for a Final Fantasy VII Rebirth discount, you're in luck. Only a few months old, Final Fantasy VII Rebirth is now on sale for $55 at GameStop ahead of Amazon Prime Day. Normally $70, the sequel to Final Fantasy VII Remake continues the bold retelling of the beloved PS1 RPG with modernized touches and expanded content. GameStop listings default to preowned copies (which are $50), so click the "New" button if you want the $55 brand-new deal
title: Final Fantasy 7 Rebirth Matches Best Price Yet In Early Prime Day Deal

description: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance just launched last month, but it's already received a steep discount as part of the sale festivities surrounding Amazon Prime Day 2024. If you haven't picked up a copy yet, your patience has been rewarded. Vengeance is up for grabs for only $40 (was $60) at multiple major retailers, including Amazon, GameStop, and
title: Shin Megami Tensei V: Vengeance Gets First Big Discount

description: Just days before Prime Day, the stunning Star Ocean: The Second Story R remake has been discounted to $30 on PS5, PS4, and Nintendo Switch (down from $50). The Second Story R has only received a handful of discounts since it launched last year, and this is the lowest we've seen it retail for yet. At Amazon, the deal is only available for the Nintendo Switch version at the moment. Meanwhile, GameSt
title: Star Ocean: The Second Story R Drops To Best Price Yet In Early Prime Day Deal

description:
Pokemon Shining Pearl is on sale for only $30 at Amazon as part of the retailer's early Prime Day sale. The Switch remake of the Nintendo DS RPG, Shining Pearl offers updated visuals while retaining the core loop of classic Pokemon. If you haven't played the latest entries in the Pokemon series, you can pick up Pokemon Scarlet for $51.

Get deal at Amazon

Pokemon Shining Pearl takes players back to the Sinnoh region for a traditional Pokemon adventure. The Switch-exclusive remake features an adorable chibi art style that gels quite well with the overall vibe of the Pearl/Diamond storyline.
title: Save 50% On Pokemon Shining Pearl Ahead Of Prime Day At Amazon
